titles.title: For the relief of Charles S. Steinert.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.

bill.summary: 8/5/1999--Introduced. Treats a named individual as if he had remained continuously employed, during a specified period, in the Government position he last held, for purposes of restoration of pay and retirement and health insurance benefits.
